name: 2D Shooter (NathanPayson)
description:
This is my 2D shooter Project.

Main Modifications:

1. Introduced story scenes in between levels

2. Created a boss battle built with 2 phases, an intermission, and a hard-enrage if you can't beat the boss in a time limit. Took a lot of inspiration from Wow Raid bosses.

3. Created a new mechanic built around touching objects before they reach destination called soaking.

Created by:  Nathan Payson
